# Rtest

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Rtest is to test the process of creating a R package

## Installation

You can install the development version of Rtest like so:

``` r
# install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github("sunny1205124/Rtest")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(Rtest)
## basic example code
data(data.X)
data(data.Y)
Y1 <- data.Y[, 1]
Y2 <- data.Y[, 2]
LEMC.est <- LEMC(data.X, Y1, Y2, N.jackknife = 200, cl.cores = 2)
```
